tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE in_game_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    purchase_date DATE,
    item_name TEXT,
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    item_category VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_currency_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    total_revenue DECIMAL(15, 2),
    total_expenditure DECIMAL(15, 2),
    net_profit DECIMAL(15, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE in_game_purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    game_title TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_currency_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_type TEXT,
    amount INT
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    purchase_datetime TIMESTAMPTZ,
    item_name TEXT,
    item_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_datetime TIMESTAMPTZ,
    player_id INT,
    purchase_id INT,
    currency_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE analytics (
    analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    session_id INT,
    session_duration TIME,
    session_date DATE
);
